mapper.select: select count(cmt_seq) from movie_comments where movie_seq = #{movie_seq}

select c.cmt_seq as cmt_seq, c.movie_seq as movie_seq, c.cmt_content as cmt_content, c.cmt_date as cmt_date, m.mb_name as mb_name, m.mb_id as mb_id, m.mb_profile as mb_profile from movie_comments c,members m where c.movie_seq = #{movie_seq} and m.mb_id = c.mb_id
mapper.insert: insert into movie_comments(movie_seq, cmt_content, cmt_date,mb_id) values(#{movie_seq}, #{cmt_content}, now(), #{mb_id})
